content:
I think I'll make a few of these refreshing drinks, including the iced tea with mint and lemon, fresh limeade, and watermelon infused water. I'll also consider making some flavored sparkling water with fruits and herbs. Thanks for the suggestions!

By the way, I was thinking of setting up a few outdoor games and activities to keep our guests entertained during the BBQ. Do you have any ideas for outdoor games that are easy to set up and play?
